TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ActivationContext extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class ActivationContext Implements IDisposable, ISerializable
public ref class ActivationContext sealed : IDisposable, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable
type ActivationContext = class interface IDisposable interface ISerializable

summary.span: Identifies the activation context for the current application.

span.span: Identifies the activation context for the current application.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含並提供僅供內部存取應用程式資訊清單。The class contains an and provides internal-only access to the application manifest. 資訊清單型啟用期間會使用啟用內容，來設定網域原則，並提供應用程式為基礎的安全性模型。The activation context is used during manifest-based activation to set up the domain policy and provide an application-based security model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件取得資訊清單為基礎的應用程式。The following code example demonstrates the use of an object to obtain the for a manifest-based application. 取得正確結果，請以資訊清單為基礎的應用程式執行這個程式碼範例。For correct results, execute this code example as a manifest-based application. [!code-csharp[System.ActivationContext#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ActivationContext/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ActivationContext#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ActivationContext/vb/program.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets the ClickOnce application manifest for the current application.

span.span: Gets the ClickOnce application manifest for the current application.

value.span: 位元組陣列，包含與此相關聯的應用程式的 ClickOnce 應用程式資訊清單。

span.span: A byte array that contains the ClickOnce application manifest for the application that is associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已啟用內容，這表示應用程式不會安裝 ClickOnce 存放區中的部署資訊清單讀取暫存的下載資料夾。If the activation context is , meaning that the application is not installed in the ClickOnce store, the deployment manifest is read from the temporary download folder. 如果已啟用內容，這表示應用程式已安裝 ClickOnce 在存放區中，部署資訊清單讀取從 ClickOnce 存放區。If the activation context is , meaning that the application is installed in the ClickOnce store, the deployment manifest is read from the ClickOnce store. 如需部署資訊清單的詳細資訊，請參閱[ClickOnce 部署資訊清單](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8457e615-e3b6-4990-8dcf-11bc590e4e9b)。For more information about deployment manifests, see [ClickOnce Deployment Manifest](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8457e615-e3b6-4990-8dcf-11bc590e4e9b).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫來建立新的啟用內容的內部建構函式。The method calls an internal constructor to create a new activation context. 實作.NET Framework 2.0 版中的類別設計的不完全的存放區中安裝也不會完全包含在資料夾中的應用程式。The implementation of the class in the .NET Framework version 2.0 is designed for applications that are neither fully installed in a store nor fully contained in a folder. 這個方法會提供在公用建構函式提供完整的啟用內容的更新版本的回溯相容性。This method provides backward compatibility for later releases in which public constructors provide full activation contexts.

span.span: is .

exception.span: No deployment or application identity is specified in .

span.span: No deployment or application identity is specified in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已啟用內容，這表示應用程式不會安裝 ClickOnce 存放區中的部署資訊清單讀取暫存的下載資料夾。If the activation context is , meaning that the application is not installed in the ClickOnce store, the deployment manifest is read from the temporary download folder. 如果已啟用內容，這表示應用程式已安裝 ClickOnce 在存放區中，部署資訊清單讀取從 ClickOnce 存放區。If the activation context is , meaning that the application is installed in the ClickOnce store, the deployment manifest is read from the ClickOnce store. 如需部署資訊清單的詳細資訊，請參閱[ClickOnce 部署資訊清單](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8457e615-e3b6-4990-8dcf-11bc590e4e9b)。For more information about deployment manifests, see [ClickOnce Deployment Manifest](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8457e615-e3b6-4990-8dcf-11bc590e4e9b).

summary.span: Releases all resources used by the .

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

summary.span: Enables an object to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資訊清單為基礎的應用程式可能未安裝 ClickOnce 存放區中。A manifest-based application might not be installed in the ClickOnce store. 不存放區中，例如在 Visual Studio 中，資訊清單啟動的應用程式執行的應用程式分類為。An application that is not in the store, such as a manifest-activated application executing in Visual Studio, is classified as . 包含在存放區的應用程式分類為。An application that is contained in the store is classified as .
